content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: ''Feint'' missiles have internal chaff dispensers and go ''dumb'' and coast on inertia for a large percentage of their flight arc to fool AMS systems. They wake up and make final trajectory adjustments just before impact. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: ''Feint'' missiles have internal chaff dispensers and go ''dumb'' and coast on inertia for a large percentage of their flight arc to fool AMS systems. They wake up and make final trajectory adjustments just before impact. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: '佯动'导弹有内部箔条分配器,在很大一部分飞行轨迹中会'静默'并使用惯性滑行,以欺骗AMS系统.他们在撞击前激活以进行最后的轨迹调整.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Trading some Offensive Potential for an Advanced Guidance Package are Guided Thunderbolt Missiles capable to be linked to an ArtemisIV FCS.
content.prevOriginal: Trading some Offensive Potential for an Advanced Guidance Package are Guided Thunderbolt Missiles capable to be linked to an ArtemisIV FCS.
content.content: 用一些进攻潜力换取先进的制导系统的制导雷霆导弹,能够连接入到月神IV火控系统.

content.original: This Thunderbolt Missile carries a high explosive warhead which deals damage to units near the hit location.
content.prevOriginal: This Thunderbolt Missile carries a high explosive warhead which deals damage to units near the hit location.
content.content: 这种雷霆导弹携带一个高爆弹头,对击中地点附近的单位造成伤害.

content.original: Kinetic Kill missiles use huge rocket motors to accelerate a heavy metal dart to high velocity. They penetrate armor well, but require time to reach full velocity. Damage increases at longer range. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 动能杀伤导弹使用巨大的火箭发动机将重金属飞镖加速到高速.它们能很好地穿透装甲,但需要时间才能达到全速.伤害在更远的距离增加.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: This Thunderbolt Missile was retooled to fire a specialized Thermobaric Warhead igniting everything around the impact and dealing massive amounts of heat.
content.prevOriginal: This Thunderbolt Missile was retooled to fire a specialized Thermobaric Warhead igniting everything around the impact and dealing massive amounts of heat.
content.content: 这种霹雳导弹经过改装,可以发射一个专门的温压弹头,点燃撞击点周围的一切,并产生大量的热量.

content.original: This rare type of Thunderbolt ammo gives flexibility to large single-missile launchers for times when getting any hit is more important than hitting hard. After launch the missile separates into four independently seeing warheads each equivalent to a TBM5. If they lose their lock on the primary target they will attempt to acquire any nearby target. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type.
content.prevOriginal: This rare type of Thunderbolt ammo gives flexibility to large single-missile launchers for times when getting any hit is more important than hitting hard. After launch the missile separates into four independently seeing warheads each equivalent to a TBM5. If they lose their lock on the primary target they will attempt to acquire any nearby target. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type.
content.content: 这种罕见的雷霆弹药为大型单枚导弹发射器提供了灵活性,当遇到任何命中比伤害更重要的时候.发射后,导弹分成四个独立的弹头,每个弹头相当于霹雳火5.如果他们失去了对主要目标的锁定,他们将试图找到附近的任何目标.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.

content.original: Kinetic Kill missiles use huge rocket motors to accelerate a heavy metal dart to high velocity. They penetrate armor well, but require time to reach full velocity. Damage increases at longer range. Because there is no high explosive warhead this ammo type deals reduced damage to user if the magazine is detonated. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 动能杀伤导弹使用巨大的火箭发动机将重金属飞镖加速到高速.它们能很好地穿透装甲,但需要时间才能达到全速.伤害在更远的距离增加.由于没有高爆弹头,如果弹匣被引爆,这种弹药类型对用户的伤害很少.弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.
